attributes.action: not enforce the broadband tax of 50p a month onto all fixed phone lines.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I do not believe that it is right the government can enforce another tax on the us without consultation and aproval from the public. Broadband although useful is not essential to the running of our lives.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
